forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny. High near 15C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Abundant sunshine. High 59F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 49F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 38F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 6C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 44F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 35F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny skies. High 47F. Winds NE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.
